text: She's been worried about her youngest son since he started high school in September because of his dyslexia. But Kelly Ripa couldn't help getting weepy when she shared that Joaquin, 14, is getting straight As despite his condition on ABC's Live With Kelly And Ryan on Wednesday. And the sight of the 47 - year - old mom tearing up set co - host Ryan Seacrest off too.
